blogPost.title: Go to Mars or go *back* to Mars? Which is it? https://t.co/jqtGr4F7o8
blogPost.author: Quora

sharedContent.title: Question on @Quora: Was Mars ever habitable enough to support more than bacteria? For how long? Would evolution have followed the same process as on Earth, seas first, land later? Did Mars's life have enough time to make it to land? https://t.co/IsJJxYGSzr
sharedContent.author: Allan Gault

localize.full_text: 火星に行く」か「火星に戻る」か？どちらなのか？https://t.co/jqtGr4F7o8
去火星还是*回火星？哪个是？https://t.co/jqtGr4F7o8
去火星還是*回火星？哪個是？https://t.co/jqtGr4F7o8

previous.title: Writing prompts can help beat writer's block. Here's a great example, with many of Quora's best creators responding: What item under $50 changed your life? https://t.co/kzSZ64xILR

localize.full_text: ライティング・プロンプトは、ライターズ・ブロックを解消するのに役立ちます。ここでは、Quoraの優秀なクリエイターたちが回答した素晴らしい例をご紹介します。あなたの人生を変えた50ドル以下のアイテムとは？https://t.co/kzSZ64xILR
写作提示可以帮助打败作家的障碍。这里有一个很好的例子，许多Quora的优秀创作者都在回应。什么50美元以下的物品改变了你的生活？https://t.co/kzSZ64xILR
寫作提示可以幫助打敗作家的障礙。這裏有一個很好的例子，許多Quora的優秀創作者都在迴應。什麼50美元以下的物品改變了你的生活？https://t.co/kzSZ64xILR
